definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: The bourdon-type pressure gauge is more convenient for most purposes than a liquid manometer.
sentences.chinese: 帶軟管的杯式壓力計是一種水銀作用式壓力計。

sentences.english: The bourdon-type pressure gauge is more convenient for most purposes than a liquid manometer.
sentences.chinese: 帶軟管的杯式壓力計是一種水銀作用式壓力計。

sentences.english: Manometers shall not be used on permanent process measurement.
sentences.chinese: 壓力計不應用於持久性工藝測量。

sentences.english: Cold cathode sensing tubes are more rugged than the glass, hot-filament tubes.
sentences.chinese: 冷陰極壓力計不能像熱絲管那樣容易和迅速地排氣。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the composition, application and maintain of the piston manometer.
sentences.chinese: 活塞式壓力計的組成及使用和維護進行了簡要的介紹。

sentences.english: After decompression operation is over, fast deflation will break through gauge pressure.
sentences.chinese: 減壓操作結束後，放氣太快，使壓力計衝破。
